Design+Banter

Design+Banter was a community of designers, connected by a series of events that took place between 2013 and 2015 in London. Each month it brought together hundreds of designers of all stripes to hear talks, share food and drinks.

All the events

  1. 1

    Hello World

    6/3/2013 • Blumsbury Lanes
    • Andrew Lucas • Lead UX/UI Designe, How Are You
    • Sam Morris • Digital Designer, The Guardian
    • Jon Gold • Designer, Makeshift
